```{r}
s <- 22
n <- 70
f <- n-s
nDraws <- 100000
alpha_0 <- 8
beta_0 <- 8

post_alpha <- alpha_0 + s
post_beta <- beta_0 + f

# rbeta drawing
samples <- rbeta(nDraws, post_alpha, post_beta)
mean_true <- post_alpha/(post_alpha + post_beta)
sd_true <- sqrt((post_alpha*post_beta)/((post_alpha+post_beta+1)*(post_alpha+post_beta)^2))
```
